message_1:
What is the time complexity of the following algorithm that finds the maximum element in an array of n integers?

Algorithm MaxElement(A)
 
   max = A[1]
  
   for i = 2 to n do
  
       if A[i] > max then
  
           max = A[i]
  
      end if
  
   end for
  
   return max
 
End Algorithm

Express the time complexity in Big O notation.
message_2: The time complexity of the given algorithm is O(n) because the algorithm iterates through the entire array of n elements once, comparing each element to the current maximum value.
